property.caption: URL
property.description: The URL of the web page to be loaded.

property.caption: Callback Regex include
property.description: A Regex that searches the navigation url where the pattern should exist in the url. If the pattern exists (together with the Regex exclude), the On Callback event is triggered.

property.caption: Callback Regex exclude
property.description: A Regex that searches the navigation url where the pattern should not exist in the url. If the pattern does not exist (together with the Regex include), the On Callback event is triggered.

property.caption: Onload Regex include
property.description: A Regex that searches the navigation url where the pattern should exist in the url. If the pattern does exists, the On Load event is triggered. If this property is empty on load will trigger always.

property.caption: Callback
property.description: The received callback, for example from SSO.
